com.github.cwilper.bigtrouble
Class ConnectionConfig

java.lang.Object
  com.github.cwilper.bigtrouble.ConnectionConfig

public class ConnectionConfig
extends Object

Configuration for node or cluster connections.

Field Summary
static int DEFAULT_FILE_CHUNK_SIZE
          The default chunk size to use when writing new files (8mb).
static Consistency DEFAULT_READ_CONSISTENCY
          The default read consistency level (ONE).
static int DEFAULT_RECORD_BATCH_SIZE
          The default maximum number of records to retrieve at once via Connection.forEachRecord.
static Consistency DEFAULT_WRITE_CONSISTENCY
          The default write consistency level (ANY).
 
Constructor Summary
ConnectionConfig(String keyspace)
          Creates a configuration for use with the given keyspace, with default values and undefined credentials.

getRecordBatchSize

public int getRecordBatchSize()
Gets the maximum number of records to that should be retrieved from the cluster at once (in memory) when calling Connection.forEachRecord.

Returns:
the maximum number of records to retrieve at once.

Sets the maximum number of records to that should be retrieved from the cluster at once (in memory) when calling Connection.forEachRecord.

Parameters:
recordBatchSize - maximum number of records to retrieve at once.
